DIR-DESCRIPCION:
DE IRISARRI ,is a clothing brand pret a porter that focuses on developing bodysuits and basics in velvet : The brands DNA.

D/IR has been in the market for years studying the female body in order to find the best fit and comfort, there is wide variety of designs that play with the versatility and a large range of colors.

All of our designs are ethically made in Colombia. We also have joined ofreces with non profit NSM, an organization focused on creating sexual education and awareness for girls and teenagers.

Our velvet pieces are a must have, if you don´t own one yet ¡ the time is now !
